extendedInfo.description: Collections of over 200 countries' national flags and wiki.Do you know each country's national flag in the world? You can see national flags of 232 countries in this app, also very easily visit each nation on the Wikipedia for more detail information.The country code is showed below the flag of each country. The code, for example "FR" (French), is used in the domain name (WWW.GOOGLE.FR) of website.Keywords: flag, nation, country, wiki, Wikipedia
